requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 8500+ Series)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM / GTX 750 or AMD R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14.x
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8
  • Processor: Intel atom Z3xx (Silvermont)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Series. 1280x720 or better required
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit ver)
  • Processor: Core i5 of Ivy Bridge generation or better or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia (VRAM 1GB or better). Recommended 1920x1080
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Devices compartible Direct Sound

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
  • Additional Notes: The game is compiled as a 32-bit executable. This might not run on certain newer versions of the OS. A 64-bit executable will be made available soon.

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
  • Additional Notes: Be advised, this game was made in Game Maker Studio 2, which supports only a subset of Linux distros.

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

results.name: HAND-TRACKING INTERACTION DEMONSTRATOR for Oculus Quest (VR)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit SP1, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T 2.9 GHz / AMD FX-6100 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit SP1, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770S 3.1 GHz / AMD FX-8320 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
